title: Crime Alert 12.31.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.31.18
description:
Family sues hotel after daughter dies in freezer. Warning to American tourists. Homicides on the rise in Mexico. Dad says he gave his three sons away to protect them. The Skelton brothers not seen since.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
